info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued November 02 at 1:26PM MDT until November 04 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Outlying areas of lower Washington County and Zion National Park. St. George proper will likely remain above 28F but may see frost. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
